              <div class="baoliao-block"> <p itemprop="description">拼多多百亿补贴iPhone专场活动正在火热进行中，iPhone15全系大降价，优惠力度空前！iPhone15 Pro Max仅需7548元起，iPhone15 Pro更是低至5798元，iPhone15 Plus和iPhone15也分别降至5198元和4498元起。参与以旧换新至高额外补贴1000元，银行卡分期至高满减250元，机会难得，错过可就遗憾了！</p><p itemprop="description" style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: rgb(187, 2, 0); font-size: 16px;"><strong>—— 好价推荐 ——</strong></span><br></p><span class="embed-card insert-outer-newline main-site simple-card" style="display:none">

<!-- <div class="bind-mobile pop-container" style="z-index: 9999">
    <div class="mobile-pop-content J_pop_content">
        <div class="J_mobile_close">
            <a href="javascript:;" class="icon-times-o mobile_close"></a>
        </div>
        <div class="mobile-login J_mobile_loggin">
            <div class="mobile-title">绑定手机号码</div>
            <div class="mobile-subtitle">依据《网络安全法》相关要求，自2017年6月1日起，会员账户需绑定手机。为了不影功能的正常使用，请您尽快完成绑定。</div>
            <div class="mobile-input-container">
                <div class="mobile-input">
                    <input placeholder="手机号"/>
                </div>
                <div class="verfily-input">
                    <input placeholder="输入验证码"/>
                    <div class="verfily-code red J_send_msg" >发送短信验证码</div>
                </div>
                <div class="agree-box">
                    <div class="agreen-box">
                        <div class="checkbox">
                            <img src="https://res.smzdm.com/business/login/select-selected.png"/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-info">
                            我已阅读并同意<span><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/user/20220119.html" target="_blank">《用户协议》</a><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/privacy/20220715.html" target="_blank">《“什么值得买”个人信息保护政策》》</a></span>       
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mobile-submit">确定</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div> -->
    <!-- comment_wrap end -->

    <p class="txt">
        爆料是一件简单又好玩的事，动动手指就能把你认可的好价商品分享给千万值友，还能获得大量金币奖励，兑换礼品卡和值得买定制礼品！赶快行动起来吧！

        <i class="J_check_video icon-video-o-thin"></i>
    </p>
